title: Does your fax do this?
content:
these serifs are so weird! i don't understand why this happens. Do most faxes do this? or is it probably just the model i've got? can anyone explain this freakishness?   
   
 ![sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525002536im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/49535.jpg)
author: pablohoney77

comments.content:
Those must be data compression artefacts.   
Are the serifs in that font slightly cupped? Or is it just Times?   
   
hhp
i'm assuming it's just Times. not all the serifs turn out this way, but as you can see it's not a rare thing either. i just became fascinated by this phenom.

Where did you get that sample?! I have been keeping this new typeface design a closely guarded secret. Iï¿½m calling my lawyer right away!   
   
   
(imagine smiley face here)   
   
cheers,   
Dana

you people make me laff!   
i needed that!
